basics.name: Matas Ye
basics.label: Senior Full Developer
basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who loves working with open source technology. I work best in planning the architecture of web applications and their development life. I also love to get the community involved and have had much experience with building and organizing large open source groups.

references.reference: i worked with richard at, where he was a valuable member a team member, than look no further. i had the pleasure of working with him on my final project at dev bootcamp where we spent 100 + hours over 7 days building a fully functional web app. brian quickly learned new concepts, and i was impressed at how he go out of his way to help level up with his expertise. i would like to give my strongest recommendation to david england., reference will be furnished upon request., adrian reference will be furnished upon request., adrian and is a conscientious developer who strong work ethic. he had a great ability to problem solve and the most important it is that he does. we worked together often delivered above and beyond his own time with excellent work. i wish him nilanga in his best as well.
